001import java.util.Stack;
002import java.util.Scanner;
003import java.io.File;
004import java.io.FileNotFoundException;
005/**
006 * Classe GameEngine- le moteur du jeu Wonders of the Broken Gate.
007 *
008 * @author Kuch
009 * @version 7.26.1
010 */
011public class GameEngine
012{
013    /**
014     * C'est parser
015     */
016    private Parser aParser;
017    
018    /**
019     * Permet de crÃ©er une interface.
020     */
021    private UserInterface aGui;
022    
023    /**
024     * Cette attribut permet de crÃ©er un joueur et d'avoir ces informations.
025     */
026    private Player aPlayer;
027    
028    /**
029     * Constructeur par dÃ©faut de game,il permet de crÃ©er les salles et de lire le clavier.
030     */
031    public GameEngine()
032    {
033        this.createRooms();
034        this.aParser = new Parser();
035    }//Game()
036    
037    /**
038     * Permet de dÃ©finir le GUI.
039     * @param pUserInterface l'interface du joueur.
040     */
041    public void setGUI( final UserInterface pUserInterface )
042    {
043        this.aGui = pUserInterface;
044        this.printWelcome();
045    }//setGui(.)
046    
047    /**
048     * createRooms a plusieurs fonctionnalitÃ©s:
049     * Il permet de crÃ©er des nouvelles rooms et de les relier.
050     * ET il permet aussi de crÃ©er des items liÃ©e Ã  une salle precise.
051     */
052    private void createRooms()
053    {
054        // creation des salles
055        Room vDepart = new Room("in the spawn room.","image/salle_apparition.png");
056        Room vPortail = new Room("in the portal room.","image/portail_casse.png");
057        Room vEntreDonjon = new Room("at the entry of the dungeon.","image/entre_donjon.png");
058        Room vAccueil1 = new Room("in the main room of the floor -1.","image/etage-1.png");
059        Room vArmurerie = new Room("in a room with a lot of equipment","image/armurerie.png");
060        Room vSallePorteF = new Room("in a room with a closed door.","image/salle_ferme_monstre.png");
061        Room vSallePnj = new Room("in a room with someone else.","image/pnj_potion.png");
062        Room vPortail1 = new Room("in a room with a monster to kill.","image/salle_monstre_portail.png");
063        Room vAccueil2 = new Room("in the main room of the floor -2.","image/etage-2.png");
064        Room vPiege = new Room("in a room with weird things written on the wall.","image/salle_ferme_enigme.png");
065        Room vSensUnique = new Room("in a room and suddenly the path behind you closes.","image/salle_sens_unique.png");
066        Room vPnjRaccourcis = new Room("in a room with someone interesting.","image/salle_pnj_raccourcis.png");
067        Room vAccueil3 = new Room("in the main room of the floor -3.","image/etage-3.png");
068        Room vSalleMonstre = new Room("in a room where you have to kill a monster.","image/salle_monstre_bloque.png");
069        Room vSortieRaccourcis = new Room("in a room.","image/salle_vers_fin.png");
070        Room vPortail2 = new Room("in a room with a part of the portal.","image/salle_portail2.png");
071        Room vPortail3 = new Room("in a room with the last part of the portal.","image/bout_de_portail.png");
072        
073        //Positionnement des salles
074        vDepart.setExit("east",vEntreDonjon);
075        vDepart.setExit("north-east",vPortail);
076        
077        vPortail.setExit("south-west",vDepart);
078        vPortail.setExit("south",vEntreDonjon);
079        
080        vEntreDonjon.setExit("west",vDepart);
081        vEntreDonjon.setExit("north",vPortail);
082        vEntreDonjon.setExit("down",vAccueil1);
083        
084        vAccueil1.setExit("up",vEntreDonjon);
085        vAccueil1.setExit("north-west",vArmurerie);
086        vAccueil1.setExit("west",vSallePorteF);
087        vAccueil1.setExit("east",vSallePnj);
088        
089        vArmurerie.setExit("south-east",vAccueil1);
090        vArmurerie.setExit("south-west",vSallePorteF);
091        
092        vSallePorteF.setExit("north-east",vArmurerie);
093        vSallePorteF.setExit("east",vAccueil1);
094
095        vSallePnj.setExit("west",vAccueil1);
096        vSallePnj.setExit("east",vPortail1);
097        
098        vPortail1.setExit("west",vSallePnj);
099        vPortail1.setExit("down",vAccueil2);
100        
101        vAccueil2.setExit("up",vPortail1);
102        vAccueil2.setExit("west",vPiege);
103        vAccueil2.setExit("east",vSensUnique);
104        vAccueil2.setExit("down",vAccueil3);
105        
106        vSensUnique.setExit("east",vPnjRaccourcis);
107        
108        vPnjRaccourcis.setExit("west",vSensUnique);
109        
110        vAccueil3.setExit("up",vAccueil2);
111        vAccueil3.setExit("east",vSalleMonstre);
112        
113        vSalleMonstre.setExit("west",vAccueil3);
114        vSalleMonstre.setExit("south-east",vSortieRaccourcis);
115        
116        vSortieRaccourcis.setExit("north-west",vSalleMonstre);
117        vSortieRaccourcis.setExit("east",vPortail2);
118        
119        vPortail2.setExit("west",vSortieRaccourcis);
120        
121        vPortail3.setExit("up",vSallePorteF);
122        
123        //crÃ©ation des items
124        Item vSword= new Item("LuminaraSword","A shimmering sword that glows like starlight, leaving a faint trail of light with every swing.",2);
125        Item vBook = new Item("ElderscriptBook","A mysterious book that glows softly, its pages filled with shifting runes that seem to whisper ancient spells.",2);
126        Item vSwordUpgrade = new Item("AstralythSword","A radiant sword that glows with the light of distant stars, leaving a trail of shimmering stardust with each swing.",4);
127        Item vBookUpgrade = new Item("NexisBook","An ancient, glowing tome with shifting pages that whisper forgotten secrets.",4);
128        Item vCookieMagique = new Item("VitalisCookie","A glowing, enchanted cookie that radiates warmth, said to instantly restore the vitality of those in need with its sweet, comforting taste.",1);
129        Item vBoutPortail1= new Item("Portal1","First part of the broken portal",5);
130        Item vBoutPortail2 = new Item("Portal2","Second part of the broken portal",5);
131        Item vBoutPortail3 = new Item("Portal3","Last part of the broken portal",5);
132    
133        //Initialisation des items
134        vDepart.addItem(vSword.getItemName(),vSword);
135        vDepart.addItem(vBook.getItemName(),vBook);
136        
137        vArmurerie.addItem(vSwordUpgrade.getItemName(),vSwordUpgrade);
138        vArmurerie.addItem(vBookUpgrade.getItemName(),vBookUpgrade);
139        
140        vSallePnj.addItem(vCookieMagique.getItemName(),vCookieMagique);
141        
142        vPortail1.addItem(vBoutPortail1.getItemName(),vBoutPortail1);
143        
144        vPortail2.addItem(vBoutPortail2.getItemName(),vBoutPortail2);
145        
146        vPortail3.addItem(vBoutPortail3.getItemName(),vBoutPortail3);
147        
148        //initialisation du lieu de dÃ©part pour le joueur.
149        this.aPlayer = new Player("William",vDepart);
150    }//createRoom()
151    
152    
153    /**
154     * Permet de se dÃ©placer de room en room avec l'affichage de la description Ã  chaque room parcourue. Avec l'options d'afficher des messages
155     * d'erreur si la commande n'est pas reconnue ou null.
156     * @param pCommand est la commande rentrer par le joueur
157     */
158    private void goRoom(final Command pCommand)
159    {
160        Room vNextRoom = null;
161        String vDirection = pCommand.getSecondWord();
162        vNextRoom = this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getExit(vDirection);
163        
164        //Afficher Go where si il y a un premier mot
165        if(pCommand.hasSecondWord() == false){
166        this.aGui.println("Go where?");
167        return;
168        }
169        //DÃ©terminer le lieu suivant
170        
171        if (vNextRoom == null) {
172        this.aGui.println("There is no door!");
173        return;
174        }
175        if(!this.aPlayer.CanMove())
176        {
177            this.aGui.println("You have no more action left !! GAME OVER");
178            this.endGame();
179        }
180        
181        else {
182            this.aPlayer.moveTo(vNextRoom);
183            this.aGui.println("\n");
184            this.aGui.println( this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getLongDescription() );
185            if ( this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getImageName() != null )
186                this.aGui.showImage( this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getImageName() );
187        }
188    }//goRoom()
189    
190    /**
191     * Une pile stocke l'historique des salles parcourues.
192     * Et back() permet de revenir en arriÃ¨re Ã  l'aide de la pile.
193     * Il y a une exception lorsque la salle actuelle est une trapdoor,on ne peut pas retourner en arriÃ¨re.
194     */
195    private void back()
196    {
197        if(!this.aPlayer.isEmpty())
198        {
199            if(this.aPlayer.isTrapdoor())
200            {
201                this.aGui.println("You cannot go back the door is closed");
202            }
203            else{
204            this.aPlayer.setCurrentRoom(this.aPlayer.getPreviousRoom().pop());
205            this.aGui.println( this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getLongDescription() ); 
206            if(this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getImageName() != null)
207            {
208                this.aGui.showImage( this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getImageName() );
209            }
210            }
211        }
212        else{
213            this.aGui.println("There is no previous room!");
214        }
215    }//back()
216    
217    /**
218     * Permet d'afficher la description de la salle actuelle avec les sorties possibles.
219     * @param pCommand Commande permettant d'avoir le lieu actuel.
220     */
221    private void printLocationInfo(final Command pCommand)
222    {
223        look(pCommand);
224        if ( this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getImageName() != null )
225                this.aGui.showImage( this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getImageName() );
226    }//printLocationInfo()
227    //Suite du tp3.2
228    /**
229     * Permet d'afficher un message de bienvenue.
230     */
231    private void printWelcome()
232    {   
233        this.aGui.println("");
234        this.aGui.println("Welcome to Wonders of the Broken Gate, traveler.\n"+"Cast into an unknown world,your ingenuity is your only hope.\n"
235        +"Venture deep into the forgotten dungeon,uncover its secrets,and gather the shards to rebuild the portal.\n"
236        +"Your journey home begins now.");
237        this.aGui.println("Type 'help' if you need help.\n");
238        Command look = new Command("look",null);
239        printLocationInfo(look);
240    }//printWelcome()
241    
242    /***
243     * Permet d'afficher un message d'aide.
244     */
245    private void printHelp()
246    {
247        this.aGui.println("\n");
248        this.aGui.println("Vos commandes sont:\n"+this.aParser.getCommandString());
249        this.aGui.println(this.aPlayer.getCurrentMoves()+"/"+this.aPlayer.getMaxMoves());
250    }//printHelp()
251    
252    /**
253     * Permet de quitter le jeu.
254     */
255    private void endGame()
256    {
257        this.aGui.println( "Thank you for playing.  Good bye." );
258        this.aGui.enable( false );
259    }//quit()
260    
261    /**
262     * Permet de reconnaitre la commande et l'utiliser.
263     * @param pCommand une commande rentrÃ©e par le joueur.
264     */
265    public void interpretCommand(final String pCommand)
266    {
267        this.aGui.println( "> " + pCommand );
268        Command vCommand = this.aParser.getCommand(pCommand);
269
270        if ( vCommand.isUnknown() ) {
271            this.aGui.println( "I don't know what you mean..." );
272            return;
273        }
274
275        String vCommandWord = vCommand.getCommandWord();
276        if ( vCommandWord.equals( "help" ) )
277            this.printHelp();
278        else if ( vCommandWord.equals( "go" ) )
279            this.goRoom( vCommand );
280        else if ( vCommandWord.equals( "quit" ) ) {
281            if ( vCommand.hasSecondWord() )
282                this.aGui.println( "Quit what?" );
283            else
284                this.endGame();
285        }
286        else if(vCommandWord.equals( "look" ))
287        {
288            this.look(vCommand);
289        }
290        else if(vCommandWord.equals( "eat" ))
291        {
292            this.eat(vCommand);
293        }
294        else if(vCommandWord.equals("test"))
295        {
296            this.aGui.println("We are testing");
297            this.test(vCommand);
298        }
299        else if(vCommandWord.equals("take"))
300        {
301            this.take(vCommand);
302        }
303        else if(vCommandWord.equals("drop"))
304        {
305            this.drop(vCommand);
306        }
307        else if(vCommandWord.equals("inventory"))
308        {
309            this.inventory();
310        }
311        else if(vCommandWord.equals("back"))
312        {
313            if ( vCommand.hasSecondWord() )
314                {this.aGui.println( "Back where?" );}
315            else
316                {
317                    this.back();
318                }
319        }
320    }//processCommand()
321    
322    /**
323     * Permet d'afficher la description dans la salle oÃ¹ l'on est si la commande rentrait est "look".
324     * @param pCommandLook est une commande de l'utilisateur(ex: look,look down)
325     */
326    private void look(final Command pCommandLook)
327    {
328        if(pCommandLook.getSecondWord()!=null)
329        {
330            this.aGui.println("look what");
331        }
332        else{
333            this.aGui.println("\n");
334            this.aGui.println( this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getLongDescription() );
335        }
336    }//look(.)
337    
338    /**
339     * Permet de manger le cookie magique qui augmente la taille de son inventaire.
340     * @param pCommand action donner par l'utilisateur.
341     */
342    private void eat(final Command pCommand)
343    {
344        if(!pCommand.hasSecondWord())
345        {
346            this.aGui.println("Eat what ?");
347            return;
348        }
349        String vItemName = pCommand.getSecondWord();
350        Item vItemEat = this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getItem(vItemName);
351        if(vItemEat == null)
352        {
353            this.aGui.println("You can't eat this");
354        }
355        else if(vItemName.equals("VitalisCookie"))
356        {
357            this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().removeItem(vItemName);
358            this.aPlayer.setMaxWeight(this.aPlayer.getMaxWeight() + 5);
359            this.aGui.println("You've eaten the "+vItemName+".\n"+"You are stronger,you can now lift: "+this.aPlayer.getMaxWeight());
360        }
361        else{
362            this.aGui.println("You can't eat this");
363        }
364    }//eat()
365    
366    /**
367     * Permet de tester des actions dans un fichier .txt
368     * @param pCommand la commande sera "test nom_du_fichier"
369     */
370    private void test(final Command pCommand)
371    {
372        if(!pCommand.hasSecondWord())
373        {
374            this.aGui.println("What do you want to test ?");
375            return;
376        }
377        String vNomFichier = pCommand.getSecondWord();
378        if(!vNomFichier.contains(".txt") ) 
379        {
380            vNomFichier+=".txt";
381        }
382        try{
383            Scanner vScan = new Scanner( new File(vNomFichier) );
384            while(vScan.hasNextLine())
385            {
386                String vLine = vScan.nextLine();
387                interpretCommand(vLine);
388            }
389            }
390        catch(final FileNotFoundException pException)
391        {
392            this.aGui.println("Sorry, the file" + vNomFichier + "not found");
393        }
394    }
395    
396    /**
397     * Permet de prendre un objet de la salle dans son inventaire.
398     * @param pCommand exemple:"take nom_objet"
399     */
400    private void take(final Command pCommand)
401    {
402        if(!pCommand.hasSecondWord())
403        {
404            this.aGui.println("What do you want to take ?\n");
405            return;
406        }
407        String vItemName = pCommand.getSecondWord();
408        Item vItemToTake = this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getItem(vItemName);
409        if(vItemToTake == null)
410        {
411            this.aGui.println("This item is not here !\n");
412        }
413        else if(this.aPlayer.CanBeTake(vItemToTake))
414        {
415            this.aPlayer.takeItemPlayer(vItemName,vItemToTake);
416            this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().removeItem(vItemName);
417            this.aGui.println("You took the item: "+vItemName);
418        }
419        else{
420            this.aGui.println("You're overload, you cannot take more items");
421        }
422    }
423    
424    /**
425     * Permet de laisser un objet de son inventaire dans la salle actuelle du joueur.
426     * @param pCommand exemple:"drop nom_objet"
427     */
428    private void drop(final Command pCommand)
429    {
430        if(!pCommand.hasSecondWord())
431        {
432            this.aGui.println("What do you want to drop ?\n");
433            return;
434        }
435        String vItemName = pCommand.getSecondWord();
436        Item vItemToDrop = this.aPlayer.getItemPlayer(vItemName);
437        if(vItemToDrop == null)
438        {
439            this.aGui.println("You don't have this item !\n");
440        }
441        else
442        {
443            this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().addItem(vItemName,vItemToDrop);
444            this.aPlayer.DropItemPlayer(vItemName);
445            this.aGui.println("You've dropped "+vItemName);
446        }
447    }
448    /**
449     * Affiche l'inventaire du joueur.
450     */
451    public void inventory()
452    {
453        this.aGui.println(this.aPlayer.PlayerInventory()+"\n"+"Weight :" +this.aPlayer.getCurrentWeight() );
454    }
455}
